subsections.chemistry: Tests for chemical components in blood such as glucose, lipids, and enzymes
subsections.hematology: Tests related to blood cells and composition
subsections.immunology: Tests assessing immune response and antibodies
subsections.infectious_disease: Tests identifying pathogens such as viruses or bacteria
subsections.tumor_markers: Blood tests used to detect or monitor cancer
subsections.vitamins_nutrition: Tests for assessing vitamin and nutritional levels
subsections.iron_studies: Tests evaluating iron status and metabolism

subsections.xray: X-ray imaging of bones and internal structures
subsections.CT: Computed tomography scans for detailed imaging
subsections.MRI: Magnetic resonance imaging for soft tissue visualization
subsections.ophthalmologic: Eye imaging for retina and corneal evaluation

subsections.ob_gyn: Obstetric and gynecologic procedures and screenings

subsections.diagnostics: Standalone diagnostic tests for eye health

subsections.disease_panels: Panels focused on screening for specific diseases
